title: Contact us!
text: Because the human and communication are a priority for Team'Doc,
text1: Team'Doc processes your information in order to be able to contact you again and for its legitimate interest in replying to requests addressed to it via the website
text2: Your personal data is collected directly from you and only those involved in the processing of contact requests have access to your information.
text3: We inform you that your data will be kept for a period of two years from our last contact and then deleted.
text4: You have the right to access, rectify and delete personal data concerning you, as well as the right to the portability of the data provided. You also have the right to object, for reasons relating to your particular situation, to the processing of your data, as well as the right to request the processing of your data to be limited. These rights may be exercised at any time by e-mail via the following address.
text5: You can also lodge a complaint with the CNIL or another data protection authority of a member state of the EU.
